title: Yorktown Battlefield Part of Colonial National Historical Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather        Orginal 12 pounder iron cannon in snow at Yorktown Battlefield. NPS Photo      Yorktown, VA climate is warm during summer when temperatures tend to be in the 80's and cold during winter when temperatures tend to be in the 30's. The warmest month of the year is July with an average maximum temperature of 89.00 degrees Fahrenheit, while the coldest month of the year is January with an average minimum temperature of 28.10 degrees Fahrenheit. Phone 757-856-1240 (24 hour recording) for status of closures.Websites that provide helpful information about weather are: Virginia State Climatology Office – Description of Virginia’s Climate Virginia State Climatology Office – Current Observations and Forecasts The Weather Channel Listing of these websites does not and is not intended to imply endorsement by the National Park Service of commercial services or products associated with the sites.
